ygData.subject: Psalm of cooling query
ygData.msgSnippet: Ususally when I hunt with a druid I use Psalm of Cooling as an additional damage shield (Since most good druids will DS the main tank...)  But hunting seafury
ygData.messageBody:
Ususally when I hunt with a druid I use Psalm of Cooling as an additional damage shield (Since most good druids will DS the main tank...) But hunting seafury cyclops the other day I noticed the "a Seafury Cyclops is chilled to the bone" message wasn't posting.

Curious to see if this was a stealth nerf, I tried it out on a few other mobs...(gnolls and a corrupt guard) and saw the message show just fine...has anyone else run into this? Are Seafuries imune to cold shields?

Thanks,

Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
